Package com.stefanbrenner.droplet.ui.actions

This package contains the droplet ui actions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractDropletAction Abstract base class for all actions used in droplet.
AbstractSerialAction Base class for all actions that interact with some serial device.
AddDeviceAction Actions to add a new device to droplet.
CancelAction Send a cancel message to the serial controller.
ControlDevcieAction Action to open a new ControlDevicesDialog.
DeviceOffAction Action to send a OFF message to a device.
DeviceOnAction Action to send a ON message to device.
ExitAction Action to exit and close the droplet application.
Messages  
NewAction Action to create a new droplet configuration.
OpenAsTemplateAction Action to open a droplet configuration as template for a new configuration.
OpenFileAction Action to open a droplet configuration from a file.
PreferencesAction Action to show droplet preferences.
SaveAsFileAction Action to save a droplet configuration as a new file.
SaveFileAction Action to save a droplet configuration.
SendAction Action to send a message containing the current droplet configuration to the serial controller.
ShowAction Action to send a message to the serial controller to receive informations about the current configuration from the controller.
StartAction Action to send a start message to the serial controller to start the number of rounds with the specified delay between them.
 

Package com.stefanbrenner.droplet.ui.actions Description

This package contains the droplet ui actions.
